attributes.action: Force public houses to allow dogs into their premises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being a dog lover and campagner on their behalf I would like to see more access to pubs for dog lovers and their pets. When out walking in the winter it's not always possible to sit outside while having a drink and something to eat. Some pubs do allow us in but many do not. A designated area would do. Just a place of refuge on cold days is all we ask.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
